title: Customer application Engineer for IoT (f/m/d)
body:
ASCO Engineering (www.asco-engineering.at) â€“ a member of ASCO Group International (www.asco-group.at) - is a technical service provider in the field of plant construction, mechanical engineering, automotive engineering, electrical engineering and information technology. As a specialist in Human Resource Management and Quality Management, the company focuses on the implementation and support of in-house projects as well as external projects for our customers.
Gratkorn
Softwareentwicklung

Ihre Aufgaben...

  • Responsible for SW development projects in embedded, security and/or cloud related topics
  • Provide technical consultancy and guidance to customers in regards to design in of NXP solutions
  • Support technical design-in and lead customer projects
  • Develop close relationship with the worldwide technical support network
  • Prepare Application-Notes and technical support materials

Unsere Anforderungen...

  • Have a bachlor degree in software Engineering or similar
  • Experience in SW development embedded microcontrollers and/or cloud services
  • Have knowledge of ANSI-C language, Android, Java, Tools and Development systems for embedded SW
  • Knowledge of Contactless technologies (BLE,WiFi, NFC/RFID)
  • Linux embedded SW
  • Project Management basic knowledge (customer related projects)
  • Experience in software development
  • Experienced with customer interfacin
  • Have good English skills in spoken und written
  • Flexible to travel

Unser Angebot...

  • Options for individual and specialised education and training
  • Good working atmosphere in an internationally successful company
  • Flat hierarchies and short decision paths
  • Flexible working hours, employee parking spaces and good public transport connections
  • The opportunity to actively shape your own career

Ihre Benefits...

Mindestgehalt

Gross salary EUR 2.600,00 for 38,5 hours per week. Possibility of overpayment depending on your qualification and experience!
